name: Domkrats Demo
description:
Domkrats is a horror visual novel prototype/demo that involves you waking up in a strange white void called "The Gap" and meeting a strange being that appears to be able to manipulate The Gap to anything it wants The Gap to be.

Quick Heads Up, this is my first visual novel. The artstyle in my opinion isn't the best and the demo/prototype is just meant for seeing whether people would like more/a continuation of this game. Plus, since I work on this game every day, this demo is a little outdated.
